channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is the Bull Market Overstretched?
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The average bull market runs for five years, and even at the lower end of the range, data shows this one likely has at least another 1...
